channel.title: Posts on Skelli
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Skelli

item.title: GitBlit 0day: Client Side Template Injection Leading to XSS Without HTML
item.description: A timeline breaking down the responsible disclosure process from finding to disclosure of a CSTI in GitBlit.

item.title: Supabase Shenanigans
item.description: Supabase is quite permissive by default, by not implementing Row-Level Security, you could be exposing PII of thousands of users.

item.title: SQL Injection in University
item.description: An SQL Injection Attack found on a European university.

item.title: From Shortcodes to Sensitive Data: Exploiting CVE-2024-13346 and Beyond
item.description: Exploiting unauthenticated shortcode execution in WordPress Avada theme to chain vulnerabilities, exposing PII, triggering callbacks, and achieving XSS.
